name: Family Farm (itch)
description:
You are a farmer. It's not much, but it's honest work. Feed your ever-growing family by planting crops and fighting off those pesky bugs!

Controls:
  MOVE:  wasd or Arrow Keys
  AIM:  right click or shift
  SHOOT:  left click or space
  TILL GRASS:  left click or space
  PLANT CROP:  left click or space
  HARVEST CROP:  left click or space

Tutorial:
First, till the grass to make a dirt patch.
Next, plant a crop.
Wait until the crop is grown, then harvest it!
Your family will grow every few days

Fence:

Building fences will block the path of the bugs. The fence can be unlocked by completing objectives.
